titles.title: A bill providing for a 10-year extension of the patent for the automatic variable pitch marine propeller.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Civil Liberties, and the Administration of Justice
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 9/14/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Commerce to extend, upon its expiration, a certain numbered patent for a period of ten years.
